Warrior.name: Warrior
Warrior.description: Strong and tough, excels in melee combat and can withstand heavy attacks.

Thief.name: Thief
Thief.description: Agile and stealthy, skilled in stealth attacks, avoiding detection, and manipulating mechanisms.

Wizard.name: Wizard
Wizard.description: Highly intelligent, uses magical spells for a variety of effects, both offensive and defensive.

Priest.name: Priest
Priest.description: Devout and spiritual, wields divine power to heal and protect, as well as to smite foes.

Ranger.name: Ranger
Ranger.description: Versatile and resourceful, masters of ranged combat and survival skills.

Monk.name: Monk
Monk.description: Spiritual warriors, their body and mind are weapons; excels in speed and combat skills.

Paladin.name: Paladin
Paladin.description: Holy warriors, blend of fighter and cleric, strong in combat and capable of healing and protection spells.

Shaman.name: Shaman
Shaman.description: Connects with the spirits to cast spells, heal, and summon elemental powers.

Necromancer.name: Necromancer
Necromancer.description: Dark and mysterious, manipulates the dead and the undead through dark magic.

Druid.name: Druid
Druid.description: Protectors of nature, adept at calling natural forces and transforming into animals.
